homeDescription:
Today is the 1000th day from 27th of November, 2016; the day when we were sitting in front of banks in Vishal Nagar to decide our future.
Happy anniversary! üéâ
I want us to remember this day. So I have come up with this game called treasure-hunt. Once you begin this game, you will see a hint on this screen, which will lead you to a treasure. If you find it, you can unlock the code and screen will show you a hint to the next treasure. There are 7 treasures hidden in this house.
All the best. üëç
